org.kepler.gui

Class KeplerEditorDropTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.dnd.DropTarget
      • ptolemy.vergil.basic.EditorDropTarget
        • org.kepler.gui.KeplerEditorDropTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class KeplerEditorDropTarget
extends EditorDropTarget
    This class is an extension of EditorDropTarget that adds support for Drag and Drop insert and replace.
    Author:
    Sven Koehler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
